phrs.translation: 麻将大师, 麻将, 麻将连连看, 表演者
麻将变奏曲, 变幻麻将
四川省麻将, 兄弟麻雀
迪士尼麻将, 迪斯尼群星麻将

sentences.sentence: This is a full-featured Mahjongg tile-matching game with 17 tile sets and 24 different lay-outs.
sentences.translation: 这是带 17 的一个全功能的 Mahjongg 瓦片匹配游戏瓦片落下和 24 不同摊开。

sentences.sentence: Activities in this year's "China Day" event include learning to write Chinese calligraphy, speak Chinese, play Tai Chi, play mahjongg and perform Chinese opera.
sentences.translation: 今年的“中国日”活动有学写毛笔字、学讲汉语、学打太极拳，学玩麻将，学演中国戏剧。
